document.full_text: a former new york city police officer was sentenced to 20 years in prison tuesday for his role in a string of more than 100 violent robberies of narcotics traffickers. the robberies netted more than $4 million in drug proceeds.
document.title: former new york police officer gets 20 years for robbery
lines_and_colors: a former new york city police officer was sentenced to 20 years in prison tuesday for his role in a string of more than 100 violent robberies of narcotics traffickers. the robberies netted more than $4 million in drug proceeds.
